fields.title: HOW DO I LINK MY ACCOUNT???
fields.body: Join the Discord, then join the Minecraft server. You will see a code. On Discord, go to the #link-account channel and send /verify <code>. Make sure you are sending a bot command!

fields.title: Is cheating allowed?
fields.body: Although the moderation is very laid back cheating is not allowed and you will be banned.

fields.title: What mods are allowed?
fields.body: Mods such as Reacharound, Tweakeroo, Gamma Utils, and Litematica are allowed but not all modules within these are, avoid anything that would cause lag.

fields.title: What are the loot box chances?
fields.body: Common: 1199, Rare: 4804, Epic: 37866, Legendary: 76000. Stats are player specific do /trigger mt_stats and check your chances on mine-treasure.com/loot

fields.title: How do I learn more about Stellarity?
How do I sit down?
fields.body: Look straight down and double crouch.

fields.title: How do I wear Banners/Special Blocks?
fields.body: Have an empty helmet slot and spam crouch with the banner/block in main hand.

fields.title: How does sleeping work?
fields.body: Only 50% of players on the server have to sleep to pass the time this is rounded up.

fields.title: How do I protect my stuff?
fields.body: You can claim an area protecting all your valuables within it's radius.

fields.title: I can't place my claim block!
fields.body: Claim blocks cannot be placed if they are overlapping with another claim, even your own.

fields.title: How many homes do I get?
fields.body: Players can have up to 6 homes plus their respawn point.

fields.title: How many claims do I get?
fields.body: Players can have up to 4 claims.

fields.title: What are upgrades, how do I craft them?
fields.body: Upgrades allow you to upgrade claims without having to destroy them, they share the same recipe as claims but the center is an Iron Ingot.

fields.title: How do I check the mobcap/spawnrates?
fields.body: Placing a black carpet will list the mobcaps, a pink one will list the spawnrates for that block.
